LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Title: Advanced Melee
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.DifferingReset: These {PawnCount} pawns have differing auto-execute settings. Click to set them all to '{Mode}'.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainResolved: This means that this pawn will automatically execute enemies whenever they can.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainResolvedPlural: This means that these {PawnCount} pawns will automatically execute enemies whenever they can.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Explain: This means that this pawn will NOT automatically execute enemies.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.ExplainPlural: This means that these {PawnCount} pawns will NOT automatically execute enemies.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Mode.Default: This pawn is using the Default auto-execute setting, which is {Mode}.\n\n{Explanation}
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Mode.DefaultPlural: These {PawnCount} pawns are using the Default auto-execute setting, which is {Mode}.\n\n{Explanation}
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Execute.Tooltip:
Perform a stylish finishing blow on a target.
Lethality depends on pawn skill and weapon.

If this pawn has a lasso equipped, they will use it to pull the target into range.

Hint: Shift+Click this button to force this pawn to walk to the target instead of using the lasso.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Error.NoAnimations: The {Weapon} cannot perform any animations, or {Pawn} does not have the skill to do any.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Error.NoSpace: There is no space to perform an execution. Using a different weapon or having a higher melee skill may enable animations that work in tighter spaces.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Error.NoLasso: {Pawn} does not have a lasso or their lasso is on cooldown, so {Target} cannot be dragged in to perform an execution.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Error.CannotLasso: {Target} cannot be lassoed by {Pawn} at the moment ({Reason}).
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Grapple.CannotLassoDefault: No valid position to drag {Target} to.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Grapple.OutOfRange: The target is out of the range of the lasso. Get closer, or hold the [Shift] key when targeting to make {Pawn} walk to execute the target.
LanguageData.AAM.Gizmo.Grapple.AltForFriendlies: The target pawn is friendly to your faction. Hold the [Alt] when targeting to confirm executing friendly pawn.
